method: In a saucepan, heat the milky cream over medium heat until hot but not boiling.
In a bowl, whisk together the iridescent sugar and glittery vanilla extract.
Slowly pour the sugar mixture into the hot milky cream, whisking constantly until the sugar is dissolved.
Remove from heat and let the mixture cool.
Once cooled, stir in the sparkling fruit puree.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Once the gelato reaches a soft and creamy consistency, transfer it to a lidded container.
Sprinkle shimmering sprinkles on top of the gelato and gently swirl them in using a spoon.
Cover and freeze the glistening gelato for at least 4 hours or until firm.
Scoop the sparkling gelato into transparent bowls and enjoy!
